duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the day-to-day maintenance and management of threat intelligence workflows, including vulnerability management, threat hunting, coordinating with incident response, and ticket processing.

Work in a Linux environment with open source and custom tools to manipulate data from Splunk, Elastic/ELK, and other sources into standardized formats, including writing custom scripts to automate basic file processing and data manipulation tasks.
Engage in threat hunting across the attacker kill-chain for advanced adversaries targeting the organization’s assets and employees, which constitute critical financial infrastructure.
Read, summarize, and analyze articles and reports from threat intelligence vendors, security websites, and researchers to determine their applicability to the organization's environment and staff.
Research new open-source tools and projects to identify opportunities for improving the workflows and efficiency of the Threat Intel Team, Red Team, and Incident Response Teams.

education_certification.credential: University degree in Engineering, MIS, CIS, or related discipline
